name: ←→↑↓
description:
Year 2042.

Thanks to virtual reality, extreme sports such as (Extreme) Virtual Skydiving have become (Extremely) popular.

Even if you feel the pain when your limbs are smashed, remember: it's just a simulation!

How To Play:

Arrow Keys - Everything.

Get through the goals to score points. 

Avoid bombs. You can pass through them before they get too big!

The game's speed will increase as your score does.

Credits

Music by Neon Shudder.

Made for Cyberpunkjam.

Thanks for playing!
